violations.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 1.69 between the foreground and shadow color (foreground color: #ffffff, text-shadow color: #c7c7c7, font size: 24.0pt (32px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 3:1

nodes.html: PLAYBOOKD
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 1.69 between the foreground and shadow color (foreground color: #ffffff, text-shadow color: #c7c7c7, font size: 24.0pt (32px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 3:1
